paper_abstract: Two methods to generate tensor-product Bezier surface patches from their boundary curves and with tangent conditions along them are presented. The first one is based on the tetraharmonic equation: we show the existence and uniqueness of the solution of Delta(4)(x) over right arrow = 0 with prescribed boundary and adjacent to the boundary control points of a n x n Bezier surface. The second one is based on the nonhomogeneous biharmonic equation Delta(2)(x) over right arrow = p. where p could be understood as a vectorial load adapted to the C-1-boundary conditions. (C) 2008 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Two C-1-methods to generate Bezier surfaces from the boundary
